title: Development of an electrochemical sensor modified with gold nanoparticles for detecting fumonisin B1 in packaged foods
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29254-29259
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04753B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Liyuan Zhao, Longzhu Zhou, Dieudonné M. Dansou, Chaohua Tang, Junmin Zhang, Yuchang Qin, Yanan Yu
Fumonisin B1 (FB1) is naturally present in the environment and can easily contaminate packaged foods during processing, storage and transportation, and electrochemical detection provides a simple way to obtain sensitive detection results.
